title.rendered: eCommerce Supply Chain Challenges with Eva.Guru

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 19:24 — 17.8MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 19:24 — 17.8MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Hai Mag CEO and cofounder of Eva “intelligent profit maximization platform for Amazon sellers”  including both resellers and Private Label sellers.

Get a 15 day free trial here.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • The challenges that supply chains face
  • Why you need to have more contingency in place with supply chain
  • What is inventory-based pricing
  • How pricing influences inventory days
  • How lower velocity makes you lose ranking
  • How Eva Guru predicts stock
  • Finding out your profit velocity
  • Check which products really make money
